title: Reduced T206 - Titus PSA 5 - Marquard 'Red 8' Variation
author: botport

posts.post_content:
Titus PSA 5- SOLD


Cash, Check or USPS Money Orders Only Please. I do not accept PayPal.
References available. If anyone needs additional scans please let me know.

Thanks, Frank

reduced price on Titus...
any interest in Rube?

Hi Frank,

I emailed you through the board yesterday, but I guess it didn't go through per the recent technical troubles. I can't locate your email address in my contacts list either, so I'm just replying here instead.

Did I sell you that Rube a few years back? I seem to remember it, but I'm not positive.

Anyway, I have a passing interest and I was wondering what you're looking to get for it. Please drop me a line at your convenience -- email link is in my signature.

If you happen to have the latest Standard Catalog, it should be listed in there as well. I'm curious what it lists at for VG.

Thank you,
-Trae
